dictionary.definition: a domesticated carnivorous mammal that typically has a long snout and an acute sense of smell
a small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractable claws
a large, heavy mammal that walks on the soles of its feet, having thick fur and a very short tail
a domesticated animal that is raised as livestock for its meat and fat
a ruminant mammal with a slender body and long legs, that is valued for its meat by humans
a ruminant mammal that is valued for its wool and meat
domesticated birds kept by humans for their meat or eggs
a cold-blooded aquatic vertebrate with gills, that can breathe only through its gills
a warm-blooded vertebrate with hair or fur, and mammary glands
a cold-blooded vertebrate with scaly skin, that breathes air and lays eggs on land
a warm-blooded vertebrate with wings and feathers, that lays eggs on land
